title: Seduced By Her Stepbrother
description: Melanie Jacobs hasn't seen her billionaire stepbrother Christian in years. After their parents' explosive divorce, she never expected to see him again but to her shock, he suddenly re-enters her life, making demands and rekindling her feelings for him! Will she resist his handsome looks and sensuous ways, or will Melanie be ... Seduced By Her Stepbrother?This is a complete short romance story, and contains hot, sensuous, explicit love scenes. It is meant for ages 18+.
author: Taryn James
